Text:
Thanks for the ul, jackfrost8787!
It's the most impressive compilation.

I'm just surprised that Neil Gaiman's BOOKS of MAGIC # 1-4 wasn't included as well as it did have John Constantine and the first appearance of the Trenchcoat Brigade in it.

Otherwise, this torrent has everything else.  ;-)

Constantine made his first appearance in The Saga of Swamp Thing #25 page 21 panel 2. Just showed he was getting intel on Abby and Swampy before he set his plan into motion. Thats my geek moment for the day. Peace.
binderguy1 here is Books of Magic:  http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/7575513/The_Books_of_Magic_V1_%28Mini-Series%29_%28Vertigo%29
MARAMING SALAMAT! THANK YOU VERY MUCH!
@ tedsclai:  Thankee sai (as Roland would say).  TPB must be grateful that all ul-ers are geeks.  Otherwise we'd never get complete torrents! ;-)
my favorite character of all time. thanks!!!!
2 seeds and 159 leeches? That's just sad. I will seed. Thanks for the ul!!!
